revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen|Weapon}} '''A_FAxeCheckUp'''
(no parameters) Calls [[A_Raise]] and checks if the current weapon has enough ammo. If so, jumps to its SelectGlow state. It is an equivalent of doing the following, in {{Class|FWeapAxe|Timon's Axe}} select state: FAXE A 0 [[A_JumpIfInventory]] ("{{Class|Mana1}}", 1, "SelectGlow") FAXE A 1 [[A_Raise]] Loop This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|FWeapAxe}} and derived classes.
